Title: Cartoon reference materials for the Criticise Lin Biao Criticise Confucius Campaign 1
Designer: Hangzhou Art Corps (杭州美术工作团)
Notes: The text on the left-hand side reads "Wage the struggle of the criticism against Lin (Biao) and Confucius (Kong) to the end" (把批林批孔的斗争进行到底). This is the first of two sheets of caricatures.
Theme: Criticize Lin Biao and Confucius (1974)Cultural Revolution Campaigns (1966-1976)
